iostat Demo

This is a demo report based on fictitious CPU data taken from an iostat log file (might be from some other machine). For such data an advanced parser was written. See project sources for more details.

CPU Statistics

Value Name Mean Min. Max.
user 15.475 % 0 % 30 %
idle 66.354 % 40 % 88 %
system 10.717 % 0 % 20 %
nice 2.283 % 0 % 5 %
iowait 2.505 % 0 % 5 %
steal 2.667 % 0 % 5 %
